channel.title: 2006-Revolution / Mezzyscape 384 Release [Shard] [User Friendly] Reuploaded!
channel.description:
[size=10pt]Further Development will continue. [/size] Because of the support here is a fix to some of the most Common problems.. Problem #1:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: client : Unsu pported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(ClassLoader.java:631) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:615) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:14 1) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:283) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(URLClassLoader.java:58) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:197) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:247) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit.
This is caused by running the source with jre6 after being compiled with jdk7 in other words you are running the source with the older version of java it may be the other way around too but I am not sure. To fix this problem make sure you have jdk7 and jre7. Jre7 - Simply go to java.com and download it. Jdk7 - [url=http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk7-downloads-1880260.html]Java SE Downloads[/url] Simply compile the source and the client using jdk7 and run with jre7. Fixed. Note: This works for other sources as well. Problem #2:
java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\windows\espkc_32\main_file_cache.dat (Access i s denied) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(RandomAccessFile.java:233) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(RandomAccessFile.java:118) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:139) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) c:\windows\espkc_32\cacheVers2.dat Error connecting to server. java.net.UnknownHostException: [url=http://www.cataserver.org]www.cataserver.org[/url] at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method) at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(NativeConstruct orAccessorImpl.java:57) at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(DelegatingC onstructorAccessorImpl.java:45) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor.java:525) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(HttpURLConnection.j ava:1661) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(HttpURLConnection.j ava:1659) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.net.[url=http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getChainedException(HttpU]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getChainedException(HttpU[/url] RLConnection.java:1657) at sun.net.[url=http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon[/url] nection.java:1240) at client.downloadcache(client.java:3659) at client.method67(client.java:3757) at client.method6(client.java:7374) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:52) at client.run(client.java:4908) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) Caused by: java.net.UnknownHostException: [url=http://www.cataserver.org]www.cataserver.org[/url] at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(AbstractPlainSocketImpl.java :176) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(PlainSocketImpl.java:157) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(SocksSocketImpl.java:391) at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:579) at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:528) at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(NetworkClient.java:180) at sun.net.[url=http://www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:388)]www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:388)[/url] at sun.net.[url=http://www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:483)]www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:483)[/url] at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.(HttpClient.java:213) at sun.net.[url=http://www.http.HttpClient.New(HttpClient.java:300)]www.http.HttpClient.New(HttpClient.java:300)[/url] at sun.net.[url=http://www.http.HttpClient.New(HttpClient.java:316)]www.http.HttpClient.New(HttpClient.java:316)[/url] at sun.net.[url=http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getNewHttpClient(HttpURLC]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getNewHttpClient(HttpURLC[/url] onnection.java:992) at sun.net.[url=http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(HttpURLConne]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(HttpURLConne[/url] ction.java:928) at sun.net.[url=http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.connect(HttpURLConnection]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.connect(HttpURLConnection[/url] .java:846) at sun.net.[url=http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon[/url] nection.java:1296) at sun.net.[url=http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getHeaderField(HttpURLCon]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getHeaderField(HttpURLCon[/url] nection.java:2594) at java.net.URLConnection.getHeaderFieldLong(URLConnection.java:639) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLengthLong(URLConnection.java:511) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLength(URLConnection.java:495) at client.downloadcache(client.java:3658) ... 5 more
You are basically like what the hell is this. But for future references please look at the first 5 lines of code which basically explain the error. The other lines are caused by the top ones.
c:\windows\espkc_32\main_file_cache.dat (Access i s denied)
This is caused by the client not being able to write the cache main file in the Windows folder this is because Windows Folder requires administrative privileges to add files to it. I thought it would be easier to just paste it all onto a pastebin so here you go. Simply replace sign/signlink.java with the one below and compile. (Note: Make sure the compiler path is set to sign/ when you compile) [url=http://pastebin.com/mutLpwNE]// Decompiled by Jad v1.5.8f. Copyright 2001 Pavel Kouznetsov. // Jad home page - Pastebin.com[/url] ^ Sorry if conventions are messed really tired :P Simply change the download link to a DIRECT Link in Client.java I think. Problem #3: Almost forgot.
Read Error: c:/espkc_32/Anim/1899.dat c:\espkc_32\cacheVers2.dat Error connecting to server. java.net.UnknownHostException: [url=http://www.cataserver.org]www.cataserver.org[/url] at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method) at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(NativeConstruct orAccessorImpl.java:57) at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(DelegatingC onstructorAccessorImpl.java:45) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor.java:525) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(HttpURLConnection.j ava:1664) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(HttpURLConnection.j ava:1662) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.net.[url=http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getChainedException(HttpU]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getChainedException(HttpU[/url] RLConnection.java:1660) at sun.net.[url=http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon[/url] nection.java:1243) at client.downloadcache(client.java:3659) at client.method67(client.java:3757) at client.method6(client.java:7374) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:52) at client.run(client.java:4908) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) Caused by: java.net.UnknownHostException: [url=http://www.cataserver.org]www.cataserver.org[/url] at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(AbstractPlainSocketImpl.java :178) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(PlainSocketImpl.java:157) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(SocksSocketImpl.java:391) at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:579) at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:528) at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(NetworkClient.java:180) at sun.net.[url=http://www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:378)]www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:378)[/url] at sun.net.[url=http://www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:473)]www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:473)[/url] at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.(HttpClient.java:203) at sun.net.[url=http://www.http.HttpClient.New(HttpClient.java:290)]www.http.HttpClient.New(HttpClient.java:290)[/url] at sun.net.[url=http://www.http.HttpClient.New(HttpClient.java:306)]www.http.HttpClient.New(HttpClient.java:306)[/url] at sun.net.[url=http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getNewHttpClient(HttpURLC]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getNewHttpClient(HttpURLC[/url] onnection.java:995) at sun.net.[url=http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(HttpURLConne]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(HttpURLConne[/url] ction.java:931) at sun.net.[url=http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.connect(HttpURLConnection]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.connect(HttpURLConnection[/url] .java:849) at sun.net.[url=http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon[/url] nection.java:1299) at sun.net.[url=http://www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getHeaderField(HttpURLCon]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getHeaderField(HttpURLCon[/url] nection.java:2660) at java.net.URLConnection.getHeaderFieldLong(URLConnection.java:639) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLengthLong(URLConnection.java:511) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLength(URLConnection.java:495) at client.downloadcache(client.java:3658) ... 5 more
This error is caused by the cache, simply upload the cache to a direct site such as a freehosting or your own domain if you have one. If you have an old Dropbox Account which was created before 2011 you will have a public folder which will allow you to upload files and create direct links. After uploading the cache change the link in Client.java. And that should cover most of the problems, enjoy using Mezzyscape 384 v1 if you experience any problems or errors put them in the comments below and I will get back to you as soon as possible. Downloads: Mediafire Source: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/o0sjz6r12re0ita/Mezzyscape_384_Source.rar]Mezzyscape 384 Source[/url] Client: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/nivfe28hnmnjx5i/Owner_Client.rar]Owner Client[/url] Cache - [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/q8t1ig4fyhwm4bw/Mezzyscape.rar]Mezzyscape[/url] [size=24pt]Don't message me your errors simply post them below and I will try to get back to you as soon as possible.[/size] Features: Really Nice Combat 24/7 Online No-Lag Friendly Staff Soon Moving to a VPS Tutorial Island Minigames. Pest Control (Under Development) Castle Wars ( Few Bugs) Duel Arena Fight Pits Working Woodcutting Pictures: [img]http://i.imgur.com/jULjE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hRgnq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/V7T0B.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/58sym.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1VJOE.png[/img] [img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/pickpocket.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/karama.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/taverly.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/FjsW2.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/d9iJB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IWB3V.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IZPNL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OnMV5.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6d3dr.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cW5sn.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/oNxEL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QEasi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/60pro.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UWICy.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/g04Xx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jAvLq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/GNuGQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/aSxBp.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1UACB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/b0D3X.png[/img] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MM-GpVbdRNE&list=UUJlkyZ-xWNW6CxIojbk9A8A&index=9&feature=plcp]Mezzyscape 384 Duel Arena - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WS_pEyhdOIQ&list=UUJlkyZ-xWNW6CxIojbk9A8A&index=2&feature=plcp]2006-Revolution Treasure Trails - YouTube[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img]Combat *All the normal features *Some degradable equipment *Weapon Poisoning [img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img]Magic *Ancients and Normals *Working Multi Barrage *Correct hits and anims [img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img]Ranged *Working throwing knifes *Normal Bows and Arrows [img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img]Prayer *Burying *Working Altars *All prayers work *Draining at JAD [img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] Mining *Emptying Rocks Woodcutting Tree stumps Examine / Prospect All the other skills are added ingame, more will be added to list. Quests Free: *Dwarf Cannon (working cannons too) *Horror from the deep *Lost City *Romeo & Juliet *Rune Mysteries (old version) *The Mage's Challenge *Dragon Slayer *Cook's assistant *Witch's Potion *Gertrude's Cat *Champions' Challenge Music and sounds *Working Sounds *Music in areas Random Events *Genie *Tree Spirit *Old man *Rock Golem *Tree turning in monster tree Minigames Duel Arena Castle Wars Fight Caves Barrows Pest Control Tzhaar Caves Miscellaneous Working Clue Scrolls A lot of working trapdoors Working Boats Working Tutorial Island Weapon poisoning Loads more!

@Antares wrote:

[quote=“NRR, post:202, topic:476265”]i get this error when running the client:

Read Error: c:/nrrcache_32/Anim/1899.dat
c:\nrrcache_32\cacheVers2.dat

not sure what it means, been trying to find the problem for awhile. And i dont want to manually put the cache in my C: drive cause my friends are idiots and they wont know how to do that. also i’m not leeching only giving access to the server to my friends. And full creds go to mezzy, im not taking any creds. Thanks.[/quote]

Bump

Try to place the default cache folder name into C:/Windows. If it works, then try to change the name.

/Ontopic
Still supporting this server, any updates lately?
